relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented to person, place, and time; gait steady
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/rubs/gallops, normal S1, S2
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation, bilaterally, no wheezes/rales/rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, mild epigastric tenderness to palpation, no rebound/guarding
